author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Whatever success I may have attained is due to the fact that since I was old enough to work at all, my ambition has never deserted me.
author: Anna Held

quote: To truly launch a great product, you need partners. Channel and marketing partners share in your success and share in the costs of reaching your target audience.
author: Jay Samit

quote: By far the most important factor in the success or failure of any school, far more important than tests or standards or business-model methods of accountability, is simply attracting the best-educated, most exciting young people into urban schools and keeping them there.
author: Jonathan Kozol

quote: Like the attack on Pearl Harbor, another hinge event in American history, 9/11 was a great tactical victory for America's enemies. But in both these cases, the tactical success of the attacks was not matched by strategic victories. Quite the reverse.
author: Peter L. Bergen

quote: I think any artist that's going to become anything in this world faces humility: with great humility comes great success.
author: Yelawolf

quote: When a film is successful, you don't need to shout about it from the rooftops. I don't believe in going into overdrive. There's no desperation to be acknowledged as the reason for a film's success.
author: Emraan Hashmi

quote: How can they say my life is not a success? Have I not for more than sixty years got enough to eat and escaped being eaten?
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: Urgent optimism is the desire to act immediately to tackle an obstacle, combined with the belief that we have a reasonable hope of success.
author: Jane McGonigal

quote: Message to all you crazed parents desperately hiring tutors and padding your kid's thin resume: Chillax. Attending an elite college is no guarantee of leadership, life success, or earnings potential.
author: Nina Easton

quote: In America, if you succeed, you don't have to apologize. In Italy, success is envied, and envy is the worst, worst, worst thing in the world. It's easy for me to say because I have had more than many others, but at the end of the day, I have never envied anyone. I wish to no one that they waste their time envying anyone else.
author: Lapo Elkann

quote: For me, I don't feel it is a success in the career to be the pretty woman; career success comes from being characters who tell us something about the truth.
author: Emmanuelle Beart

quote: The FHA's success provides strong evidence that government can and should play a role in the nation's mortgage finance system. It also demonstrates that although government intervention in the economy during the Great Recession was messy, things would have been a lot messier without it.
author: Mark Zandi

quote: Art isn't held with the same high regard as it is after success. In any country, in any language, you're a loser if you're making music until you prove otherwise.
author: K'naan

quote: I don't really recognise success. I don't see myself as on an upwardly mobile trajectory. I see myself as on the edge of a cliff about to fall off.
author: Jonathan Ames

quote: These rules may seem simple enough, but it will require great morale and physical courage to adhere to them. But if carried out in the strict sense of the word it will surely lead to a greater success than could otherwise be attained.
author: Major Taylor

quote: To these ideals which were instilled in me when I was a youth, I attribute in a large degree the success that was mine on the bicycle tracks of the world.
author: Major Taylor

quote: What's really cool about our family is that we don't hold grudges, and I think that is what's been the key to the success. We get into our little disagreements, and whether we're right or wrong, we'll go and apologize. That's just the way we are.
author: Selena

quote: I think there's an awful lot of noise about the Church being persecuted but there is a more real issue that the conventional churches face - that the people who are really driving their revival and success believe in an old-time religion which, in my view, is incompatible with a modern, multi-ethnic, multicultural society.
author: Trevor Phillips

quote: We just did the best we could with quite a limited budget, to be honest, and had a lot of success.
author: Rupert Sanders

quote: Having created a business that is a success, when you are in a nepotistic situation, people who don't do anything themselves, well, it is easy for them to say it's never good enough.
author: Vikram Chatwal

quote: After I won the Oscar, my salary doubled, my friends tripled, my children became more popular at school, my butcher made a pass at me, and my maid hit me up for a raise.
author: Shirley Jones

quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.
author: Al Bernstein

quote: The Nationals tried hard to recover the lost ground. The final result, however, was the success of the Forest Citys by a score of 29 to 23 in a nine innings game, twice interrupted by rain.
author: Henry Chadwick

quote: Value is created for the customer, and that allows our suppliers, agents and staff that work with Sany to obtain success.
author: Liang Wengen

quote: The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen.
author: Sarah Brown

quote: I'm not a success, I'm a sensation.
author: Van Cliburn

quote: While I was doing stand-up, I thought I knew for sure that success meant getting everyone to like me. So I became whoever I thought people wanted me to be. I'd say yes when I wanted to say no, and I even wore a few dresses.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Hollywood has a way of making everything seem like an overnight success.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Everyone saw me on TV or read articles, and it was all about my great marriage, the white picket fence, all this success and my perfect life. But behind the scenes, it was a struggle.
author: Lindsey Vonn

quote: In this world it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: What did you have the potential to do? And if you came close to that, if you maximized that, then you were a success in God's eyes. So many of us do things that the world would say is successful, but we have so much more potential.
author: Tony Dungy

quote: You may lose your wife, you may lose your dog, your mother may hate you. None of those things matter. What matters is that you achieve success and become free. Then you can do whatever you like.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: Sometimes I worry about being a success in a mediocre world.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Personal satisfaction is the most important ingredient of success.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Anybody who is an entrepreneur is a person who essentially has impaired judgment. The odds of success are zilch.
author: Tom Peters

quote: Our worldly successes cannot be guaranteed, but our ability to achieve spiritual success is entirely up to us, thanks to the grace of God. The best advice I know is to give is to give those worldly things your best but never your all - reserve the ultimate hope for the only one who can grant it.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: To be successful you have to be lucky, or a little mad, or very talented, or find yourself in a rapid growth field.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: Success is like death. The more successful you become, the higher the houses in the hills get and the higher the fences get.
author: Kevin Spacey

quote: Nothing recedes like success.
author: Walter Winchell

quote: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
author: Max Planck

quote: One of the signs of a bad coworker is a pattern of persistent undermining - intentionally hindering a colleague's success, reputation, or relationships.
author: Adam Grant

quote: Success happened little by little for me. I tasted the flavor of fame in small doses: I started at 10 years old when I won a music contest; I was performing at birthday parties, company meetings.
author: Shakira

quote: Sporting success doesn't happen by accident. It takes hard work and determination on the part of the individual athletes. And it also takes investment in facilities and training support.
author: Nicola Sturgeon

quote: Success, I've come to realise, is fleeting so you shouldn't value it too much.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?
author: Jeff Rich

quote: Success is not getting what you want, it's enjoying what you have.
author: Glen Campbell

quote: When you win, nothing hurts.
author: Joe Namath

quote: Half of my success is my fearlessness and recklessness - of just seeing the end and not stopping until you get there.
author: Rob Dyrdek

quote: From success you get a lot of things, but not that great inside thing that love brings you.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: For a guy who used to steal watches on the streets of Chandni Chowk for kicks, I surely think my success at the age of 22 was pretty early!
author: Akshay Kumar

quote: It is on our failures that we base a new and different and better success.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: If you want to achieve things in life, you've just got to do them, and if you're talented and smart, you'll succeed.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: Rockefeller once explained the secret of success. 'Get up early, work late - and strike oil.'
author: Joey Adams

quote: It's our nature: Human beings like success but they hate successful people.
author: Carrot Top

quote: Success came to us at an age where we could enjoy it. We went through a lot of hard times, so we appreciate success all the more now.
author: Matt Lucas

quote: The heritage of a British actor revolves around the challenges of playing the classic roles to meet certain levels of success as an actor. In America, the heritage of an actor is based on cinema mainly.
author: Brian Cox

quote: I have kissed in almost all the films except in 'Once Upon A Time In Mumbaai.' I'm not sure if my kissing on screen has anything to do with the success of a film, but producers make sure to put a kissing scene or two. They feel my kissing scenes are my lucky streak.
author: Emraan Hashmi

quote: My dear husband, Richard, has been the driving force behind my success and rise to whatever level I am now. My story and legacy is incomplete without his mention.
author: Joyce Banda

quote: I attribute my success to my mental approach to the game. I have always been a serious student of umpiring. I enjoy studying rules, situations, and positioning.
author: Jim Evans

quote: Success isn't everything but it makes a man stand straight.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: While it may be tempting to bask fully in the glory of success, remember: When a CEO takes too much credit for the good, they will receive far too much criticism for the bad.
author: Judy Smith

quote: With success came an ever-growing burden of responsibility. I lived with a near-constant low-level anxiety that I would make a mistake that would not only threaten my career, but also my brothers' - not to mention the livelihoods of many people who work with us or for us.
author: Donny Osmond

quote: You just hope that you will get the opportunity to do what you love and pay your bills, and that is being a success as an actor.
author: Debra Messing

quote: Someone might look like an overnight success, but there's a lot of hard work that goes into it, and rightfully so. That's the way it should be. There are exceptions to that rule, but in country music, people really have to pay their dues.
author: Frankie Ballard

quote: In a balanced organization, working towards a common objective, there is success.
author: Arthur Helps

quote: We have built brands that resonate deeply with our customers. Our strategy to grow these brands is clear, and we have strong teams in place to execute this strategy. That is our formula for success.
author: Richard Hayne

quote: Flags are about proclaiming power... that visibility is key to our success and to our justice.
author: Gilbert Baker

quote: I don't think about financial success as the measurement of my success.
author: Christie Hefner

quote: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success.
author: Irving Berlin

quote: Success doesn't mean that you are healthy, success doesn't mean that you're happy, success doesn't mean that you're rested. Success really doesn't mean that you look good, or feel good, or are good.
author: Victoria Principal

quote: The success and the failure are not my concern, but His.
author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

quote: But we look back now, and we realize the Great Society was not a success.
author: Alphonso Jackson

quote: She's been a smack addict, she's had big success in Europe in the '70s, and she's lost everything. She's been rediscovered in the '80s, and as we meet her she's just about to sign a new recording contract.
author: Neil Tennant

quote: I came to success very late in life.
author: Kelly Masterson

quote: Success, in a generally accepted sense of the term, means the opportunity to experience and to realize to the maximum the forces that are within us.
author: David Sarnoff

quote: The reason that Google was such a success is because they were the first ones to take advantage of the self-organizing properties of the web. It's in ecological sustainability. It's in the developmental power of entrepreneurship, the ethical power of democracy.
author: Ron Eglash

quote: The joy of songwriting only gets messed up if you are trying to follow up a big success, or you are trying to create a hit single, or if you have conscious thoughts of a particular outcome for the music.
author: Tim Finn

quote: Sometimes you learn more from failure than you do from success, and in some ways it's better to have failure at the beginning of your career, or your life.
author: Michael Crawford
